attr.title: Perfect Dark
attr.desc: Perfect Dark is a 2000 first-person shooter developed and published by Rare for the Nintendo 64. It has been decompiled and ported to modern platforms - https://github.com/fgsfdsfgs/perfect_dark - and runs natively on 32-bit and 64-bit ARM processors.
attr.desc_md: Perfect Dark is a 2000 first-person shooter developed and published by Rare for the Nintendo 64. It has been decompiled and ported to modern platforms - [https://github.com/fgsfdsfgs/perfect_dark](https://github.com/fgsfdsfgs/perfect_dark) - and runs natively on 32-bit and 64-bit ARM processors.
attr.inst: To run the port, you must already have a Perfect Dark ROM. Only the version ntsc-final/US V1.1/US Rev 1 (md5 e03b088b6ac9e0080440efed07c1e40f) is supported. Place this file in the gamedata/ folder.
